preqs: Students must have passed AFW2491, ACW2491, ACG2491 or AFG2491 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACG2491, AFG2491, AFW2491} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACC3160, ACC3631, AFC3160, AFF3631, AFW3041}

description: Overview of auditing, the auditor's legal liabilities, audit process and evidence, the concepts of materiality and risks, study and evaluation of internal control, EDP auditing, audit sampling techniques, the test of transactions cycles and the verification of account balances, auditors reports, and internal and operational auditing.
